Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Great experience! We spent every of our 3 evenings at this coffee shop. Reminds one of an pub. The guy at the counter was super funny and helpful and if you‚Äôre lucky, you can get a table at the top floor.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Such an amazing place. Will remember coming here with my sisters all my life. Such a fantastic vibe. Will come every time we visit Amsterdam. Can not wait.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Since there is take away the door is locked. There was nobody to help me. After trying to open the door a couple times a very upset person told me in a very rude way to stop shaking the door. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Awesome little coffeeshop in a prime location. Reasonable prices and decent menu. Quite small with limited seating but much quieter and more relaxed than other coffeeshops we frequented. Good to see they were so vigilante about ID'ing ‚Ä¶

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: When I visit Amsterdam I always stop here to load up for my night. The pre rolls usually have 70/30 tobacco and weed ratio but I often order 2 grams to roll my own. They have everything u need when it comes to rolling up. Had a panic attack one morning while sitting up top with some friends. But I‚Äôm pretty sure I was just really high

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: cozy place and friendly pleasant service. I recommend it.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: 6/5 STARS. Absolutely a place I will remember forever. The decor, the staff, the location, the vibe and the products. It really is the full package and if you don't believe me, visit yourself and see how packed it always is. The ‚Ä¶

Name: The Jolly Joker

Name: The Jolly Joker

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Best place to be. Good coffee for just 2,75! Lots of people but still cosy. Security is always present so you get to feel safe and chill.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Absolutely great place to have your coffee and smoke. Music is on point not to loud but just enough. Peeeerfect! If you are in Amsterdam you have to come through!

Name: The Jolly Joker

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: A nice shop we enjoyed every visit during our stay. It was well stocked, good prices (in comparison) plenty of beverages to choose from. It‚Äôs a must for us every time we visit, and it never lets us down. Great couple of hours spent watching people enjoy this beautiful city.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: First time to Amsterdam, always wanted to visit this place.  Flight delay gave us literally 24 hrs here and we enjoyed every minute of it!  Jolly Joker was a great coffee shop that wasn't intimidating at all.  Went up to the bar,  ordered a ‚Ä¶

Name: The Jolly Joker

Review Text: Nice coffeeshop, it's comfortable, the weed is good and it's not one of the more expensive in town. Only downside for me is that the barman kept putting the music louder and louder it was sometimes difficult to speak with my friends at the same table.

Name: The Jolly Joker

Name: The Jolly Joker

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: My new favorite coffeeshop went in there twice morning and night different staff and they where very nice got prerolls there and they where excellent will be back next month and will definitely be going back

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Everything was fine, ok selection not that huge. As always ask the staff if you would like to find your mood essence! Staff was friendly. Store is situated in a corner so can get crampy at times, but overall relaxed atmosphere.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: We didn‚Äôt actually go inside this coffee shop but my mum slipped and fell right outside and the staff was so incredibly kind and helpful, bringing her a chair and water. Lovely people, you should absolutely patronize this place!

Name: The Jolly Joker

Review Text: By far the worst coffeeshop i have ever been to. My friend was having a bad trip and the last thing he needed was any negative confrontation. Instead of helping out, the staff behind the bar wanted to kick us out. We tried to order some tea ‚Ä¶

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Great place to pop in and have a quick smoke before you carry on with the touring of Amsterdam. The pre rolled and mixes were excellent and would recommend most to pop in and have a look.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Clean place awesome weed and laid back people from all walks of life.  Met a 6th grade teach that share some mind blowing hash.  Found a great house boat to live on near Jolly so I'll be visiting back when I return.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: My all time favourite coffee shop!!

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Cool place, friendly personnel and good prices. The only min point is that the place was full of smoke, thus breathing in there was tricky.

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Came here once before a couple of years ago and didn't like it. Came again this time and it's alright. Not the friendliest but a nice bar to sit at and no need to use herbal mix like in other places. Would visit again

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Great weed great people, I had about a 2 hour chat with an employee that was just sitting there smoking. The coffee was amazing and I had a very enjoyable time while traveling alone in Amsterdam

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: Great atmosphere and good company to be found here!!!

Name: The Jolly Joker
Review Text: A small quaint looking building, my first stop when I arrive in dam. Very strong draw only offer big Buddha or ammy haze but take it from me if you like potent draws the jolly joker has got you sorted.
